mysql.host.desc: specify the hostname/address of mysql server

mysql.port.desc: specify the mysql server's port which  the client should connect to

mysql.user.desc: specify the user's name the client should connect with

mysql.pswd.desc: specify the user's password the client should connect with

mysql.db.desc: specify the database the client should use

cmd.s.addr.desc: specify the address which the protocol will listen to

cmd.s.port.desc: specify the port which the protocol will listen to

prc.netTno.desc: specify the thread number for Net Processor/ThreadPool

prc.fsmTno.desc: specify the thread number for Fsm Processor/ThreadPool

log.pattern.desc: specify how to log a message. please refer to log4plus' manual.

log.filename.desc: specify the file which will be logged to

log.fileSize.desc: specify the max size(MB) for a single file.

log.fileNum.desc: specify the max file number which the log files should keep.
